column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/b920148258ac78d975ded66eebfa8c0c89de3b9b for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

So this makes the step always 100000 satoshis = 1mBTC?

Yes that's a little bit more I consistent suppose.

Yes, always 1mBTC for bitcoinamountfield by default.

In options dialog for the fee its been set to CTransaction::nMinTxFee. Otherwise the single step is pretty useless for the fee setting.
